channel.title: Help please
channel.description: can someone tell me how you make a on screen menu that says the people online and you website?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

its called a menu

[code]public void ServerHelp()
{
if(playerRights < 4){

			sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome "+playerName, 8144);  //Title
			clearQuestInterface();
			sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome to Alexscape ", 8145);
			sendFrame126("@dre@If you crash and CAN'T connect, Restart Client !", 8147);
			sendFrame126("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8149);
                                    		sendFrame126("@blu@=== Your pk stats ===", 8151);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8152);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8153);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8154);
                                    		sendFrame126("@blu@=== Some Commands ===", 8156);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@::starter ( only once ! )", 8157);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@::help", 8158);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@::modhelp", 8159);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@::yell", 8160);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@::empty", 8161);
                                    		sendFrame126("@dre@::players", 8162);
	                        	sendFrame126("@dbl@@dre@~~ Enjoy ~~", 8164);
	                        	sendFrame126("@dbl@Owners :@dre@ Alex & Adrain", 8165);
			sendQuestSomething(8143);
			showInterface(8134);
			flushOutStream();
                               }[/code]

use this command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { ServerHelp(); } there
